item.title: ‘Motor City’ Review: Alan Ritchson and Shailene Woodley Wade Through Cliché in Overstretched Stylistic Exercise
item.description: Ben Foster and Pablo Schreiber also star in Potsy Ponciroli’s violent crime thriller set in 1977 Detroit, which played at both the Venice and Toronto Film Festivals.

item.title: ‘Motor City’ Review: Alan Ritchson and Shailene Woodley Wade Through Cliché in Overstretched Stylistic Exercise
item.description: Ben Foster and Pablo Schreiber also star in Potsy Ponciroli’s violent crime thriller set in 1977 Detroit, which played at both the Venice and Toronto Film Festivals.

item.title: TIFF Hidden Gem: ‘Motor City’ Speaks Volumes Without Saying a Word
item.description: Director Potsy Ponciroli trades dialogue for raw emotion, plenty of needle drops and muscle in a 70’s era revenge tale led by Alan Ritchson and Shailene Woodley.

item.title: ‘Motor City’ Stars Shailene Woodley and Ben Foster on Method Dressing and New (Dialogue-Free) Film
item.description: The actors sat down with The Hollywood Reporter during the Venice Film Festival to talk playlists, Potsy Ponciroli’s experimental action thriller and whether or not they’ve seen ‘Reacher.’
